metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Owner Of A Lonely Heart is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Owner Of A Lonely Heart has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Dorian, A Mixolydian,  and F Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
